                 "prev_agent" => NavAction::PrevAgent,
                 _ => return Err(anyhow!("Invalid navigation action, use 'next_agent' or 'prev_agent'")),
             };
             Ok(KeyAction::Navigate(nav))
         }
         s if s.starts_with("command:") => {
             // Format: command:CMD or command:CMD:blocking
             let cmd_part = s.strip_prefix("command:").unwrap();
             let (command, blocking) = if let Some((cmd, "blocking")) = cmd_part.rsplit_once(':') {
                 (cmd.to_string(), true)

 read src/app/key_binding.rs:150-449


     #[test]
     fn test_keys_for_action() {
         let mut bindings = HashMap::new();
         bindings.insert("y".to_string(), KeyAction::Approve);
         bindings.insert("Y".to_string(), KeyAction::Approve);
         let kb = KeyBindings { bindings };

         let approve_keys = kb.keys_for_action(&KeyAction::Approve);
         assert!(approve_keys.contains(&"y".to_string()));

      ...
  226             KeyAction::ExecuteCommand(CommandConfig {
  227                 command: "zede ${SESSION_DIR}".to_string(),
  228                 blocking: false,
  229                 terminal: false,
 +230                 external_terminal: false,
  230             }),
  231         );
  232         bindings.insert(
  233             "M-t".to_string(),
  234             KeyAction::ExecuteCommand(CommandConfig {
  235                 command: "wezterm cli attach ${SESSION_NAME}".to_string(),
  236                 blocking: true,
  237                 terminal: false,
 +239                 external_terminal: false,
  238             }),
  239         );
  240
  241         let kb = KeyBindings { bindings };
  242
  243         // Serialize to TOML
  244         let toml_str = toml::to_string_pretty(&kb).unwrap();
  245         println!("Serialized TOML:\n{}", toml_str);
  246
  247         // Deserialize back
  248         let parsed: KeyBindings = toml::from_str(&toml_str).unwrap();
  249
  250         // Verify round-trip
  251         assert_eq!(kb.bindings.len(), parsed.bindings.len());
  252         match parsed.get_action("z") {
  253             Some(KeyAction::ExecuteCommand(CommandConfig {
  254                 command,
  255                 blocking,
  256                 terminal,
 +259                 external_terminal,
  257             })) => {
  258                 assert_eq!(command, "zede ${SESSION_DIR}");
  259                 assert!(!blocking);
  260                 assert!(!terminal);
 +264                 assert!(!external_terminal);
  261             }
  262             _ => panic!("Expected ExecuteCommand action"),
  263         }
  264         match parsed.get_action("M-t") {
  265             Some(KeyAction::ExecuteCommand(CommandConfig {
  266                 command,
  267                 blocking,
  268                 terminal,
 +273                 external_terminal,
  269             })) => {
  270                 assert_eq!(command, "wezterm cli attach ${SESSION_NAME}");
  271                 assert!(blocking);
  272                 assert!(!terminal);
 +278                 assert!(!external_terminal);
  273             }
  274             _ => panic!("Expected ExecuteCommand action"),
  275         }
